thread.title: Francie
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Francie

author: Francie
title: Francie
text: We only buy White Mountain puzzles and we have about 150 puzzles. Our family knows only to buy White Mountain puzzles for us. We both are retired and especially in the winter it passes the time for us. The pieces are the right size and the collages are interesting to do. We date each puzzle when we are done and will do it again later. My husband and I love White Mountain. Wish I could take a trip to your shop and look at your discontinued section.
